extendedInfo.description: This is a very interesting game that shows your ability to act out different roles.  You will be expected to act out roles such as a profession, a movie character, a popular person etc.How will you act our Michael Jackson?Can you act out a medical doctor?How about Madonna or Glee?Still guessing who will be able to act better - you or your friend?Click on the download button and start playing this game with your friends as you take turn to act out different roles, this may be person, situation or things. Feel free to contact us if you have any question.
